about 

Hi! I am a recent CS graduate from Cal Poly Pomona. Originally from the pacific island of Guam, I moved to California to pursue a B.S. in Computer Science. Since then, I have gained experience in web development, mobile development, and virtual reality technologies.

When I’m not coding, I’m usually sketching art or making beats.
